title: Chicken Noodle Soup
summary: Need a dairy free main course? Chicken Noodle Soup could be an excellent recipe to try. One serving contains 318 calories, 17g of protein, and 7g of fat. For $1.87 per serving, this recipe covers 34% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 6. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 1 hour and 5 minutes. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. Autumn will be even more special with this recipe. A mixture of shiitake mushrooms, udon noodles, garlic, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. To use up the sunflower oil you could follow this main course with the Banana Bread no.7 as a dessert. With a spoonacular score of 88%, this dish is outstanding. Similar recipes include Buttered Noodle Chicken Noodle Soup, Chicken Noodle Soup, and Chicken Noodle Soup.

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.
